About Videos Softwares

FortressBot

C# Moderation Discord bot

Moderation discord bot capable of auto-deleting server invite links and auto-cleaning of usernames/nicknames

StatusBot

C# Notifier Discord bot

A special discord bot made to notify users of other bots going offline

TridentFrame

Desktop GIF/APNG manipulation tool

The swiss army knife of GIF/APNG manipulation with a wide range of features and a modern UI

Rhombus

C# OCR Discord bot

A discord bot with OCR (Optical Character Recognition) capabilities

Further support and donations are always appreciated <3
